section.title: Description
section.p: Visual examination of the colon (with a colonoscope) from the cecum to the rectum; requires sedation [Source: WordNet 2.0, 2003 Princeton University ]

stentry.p: Indicates the results of the diagnostic test COLONOSCOPY. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.
The date of the diagnostic test COLONOSCOPY. If this test was not done, record a '0'.
